sentences.sContent: He has just published his tenth novel.
sentences.sContent_eng: He has just published his tenth novel.
sentences.sCn: 他刚刚发表了他的第十本小说。

sentences.sContent: This is my tenth year of working with students with autism.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is my tenth year of working with students with autism.
sentences.sCn: 这是我教授患有孤独症的学生们的第十个年头。

trans.tranOther: one of ten equal parts of something
